text: He is here and she is here.
translate: El este aici şi ea este aici.

text: We only work for five days.
Peter and Martha are from Berlin.
translate: Peter şi Martha sunt din Berlin.

text: Do both of you speak German?

translate: Şi Madrid şi Berlin sunt capitale.

text: Capital cities are big and noisy.

translate: Canada se află în America de Nord.
Panama se află în America Centrală.

text: In which hotel are you staying?
How long have you been here for?
How long will you be staying?
Shall we see each other tomorrow?

text: We are having class / a lesson.
We want to speak with people.

text: Do you drink tea with lemon?
Do you drink coffee with sugar?

text: Where do they like to go?
They like to listen to music.

text: They do not like to dance.
I was at the cinema yesterday.

text: We are cleaning the apartment today.
My husband is washing the car.

text: I am putting the laundry in the washing machine.

text: I am hanging up the laundry.

text: What would you like to drink?
Do you play a musical instrument?
I am currently reading this book.

text: Are you here for the first time?
No, I was here once last year.
translate: Nu, am fost deja anul trecut aici.

text: How do you like it here?
A lot. The people are nice.
And I like the scenery, too.
Does it disturb you if I smoke?
No, my wife / my husband is also here.

text: And those are my two children.
translate: Şi acolo sunt cei doi copii ai mei.

text: What’s playing at the theatre / theater (am.) this evening?
translate: Ce spectacol este în seara asta la teatru?

text: What’s playing at the cinema / movies (am.) this evening?
translate: Ce film rulează în seara asta la cinematograf?
Ce program este în seara asta la televizor?

text: Are tickets for the theatre / theater (am.) still available?
Are tickets for the cinema / movies (am.) still available?
Are tickets for the football / soccer am. game still available?
translate: Mai sunt bilete pentru meciul de fotbal?

text: I want to sit in the back.
translate: Vreau să stau în spate de tot.

text: I want to sit somewhere in the middle.
translate: Vreau să stau undeva în mijloc.

text: I want to sit at the front.
translate: Vreau să stau în faţă de tot.

text: Can you get me a ticket?
translate: Îmi puteţi face rost de un bilet?

text: Is there a golf course nearby?
translate: Este aici în apropiere un teren de golf?

text: Is there a tennis court nearby?
translate: Este aici în apropiere un teren de tenis?

text: Is there an indoor swimming pool nearby?
translate: Este aici în apropiere o piscină acoperită?

text: Is the market open on Sundays?
Is the fair open on Mondays?
Is the exhibition open on Tuesdays?
Is the zoo open on Wednesdays?
Is the museum open on Thursdays?
Is the gallery open on Fridays?
Does one have to pay an entrance fee?
How much is the entrance fee?
Is there a discount for groups?
Is there a discount for children?
Is there a discount for students?

translate: Ce fel de clădire este aceasta?

text: What do you do for a living?

translate: Soţul meu este de profesie medic.

text: I work as a nurse part-time.
translate: Eu lucrez cu jumătate de normă ca şi asistentă medicală.

text: We will soon receive our pension.
What would you like to become some day?
I would like to become an engineer.
I want to go to college.
I am doing an internship abroad.
We always go to the cafeteria at noon.
translate: La prânz mergem întotdeauna la cantină.

text: I am looking for a job.
I have already been unemployed for a year.
translate: Sunt deja de un an şomer.

text: There are too many unemployed people in this country.
translate: În ţara asta sunt prea mulţi şomeri.

text: I have the appointment at ten o’clock.
Please take a seat in the waiting room.
translate: Vă rog luaţi loc în sala de aşteptare.

text: The doctor is on his way.
What insurance company do you belong to?
What can I do for you?

translate: Am tot timpul dureri de spate.
Vă rog să vă dezbrăcaţi la bust.

text: Lie down on the examining table.
I will give you an injection.
I will give you some pills.
I am giving you a prescription for the pharmacy.
translate: Vă prescriu o reţetă pentru farmacie.

text: Where is the nearest post office?
Is the post office far from here?
translate: Este departe până la următoarea poştă?

text: Where is the nearest mail box?
I need a couple of stamps.
translate: Am nevoie de două timbre poştale.

text: For a card and a letter.
translate: Pentru o vedere şi o scrisoare.

text: How much is the postage to America?
translate: Cât costă taxa poştală pentru America?

text: Can I send it by air mail?
translate: Pot să îl trimit par avion?

text: How long will it take to get there?
translate: Cât durează până ajunge la destinaţie?

text: Where can I make a call?
translate: De unde pot da un telefon?

text: Where is the nearest telephone booth?
Do you have a telephone directory?
Do you know the area code for Austria?
One moment, I’ll look it up.
You have to dial a zero first!
translate: Trebuie să formaţi mai întâi zero!

text: I want to buy a present.
A large one or a small one?
May I see this one, please?
Or is it made of plastic?

translate: Este o calitate deosebit de bună.

text: And the bag is really very reasonable.
Can I exchange it if needed?
We feel like. / We want to.
We don’t feel like. / We do’t want to.
No, I don’t understand them so well.
translate: Nu, nu-i înţeleg aşa de bine.

text: No, it costs only one hundred Euros.
translate: Nu, nu costă decât o sută de Euro.

text: Do you want some more soup?
But I already know a lot of people.

translate: Nu, numai la sfârşit de săptămână.

text: I would like to open an account.
I want to deposit money in my account.
translate: Doresc să depun bani în contul meu.

text: I want to withdraw money from my account.
translate: Doresc să ridic bani din contul meu.

text: But I will be back on Sunday.
But she already has a boyfriend.
I want to pick up the bank statements.
translate: Doresc să ridic extrasele de cont.

text: I want to cash a traveller’s cheque / traveler’s check (am.).
translate: Doresc să încasez un cec de călătorie.

text: I’m expecting a transfer from Germany.

translate: Aici este numărul meu de cont.

text: Could you please give me small notes / bills (am.)?
translate: Vă rog să-mi daţi bancnote mici.
Unde este un teren de tenis?

text: Is there a cashpoint / an ATM (am.)?
translate: Aveţi aici un automat de bani?

text: How much money can one withdraw?
Which credit cards can one use?
translate: Ce fel de cărţi de credit se pot utiliza?

text: Where is the football / soccer (am.) field?
translate: Unde este un teren de fotbal?

text: My foot and hand also hurt.
translate: Piciorul şi mâna mă dor de asemenea.

text: I have a car / an automobile.
Do the students learn a lot?
Do you often ask the teacher questions?
No, I don’t ask him questions often.
Yes, he is working right now.
I also have a jacket and a pair of jeans.
translate: Am şi o jachetă şi o pereche de blugi.
Unde este o maşină de spălat?

text: I have a knife, a fork and a spoon.
translate: Am un cuţit, o furculiţă şi o lingură.

text: Where is the salt and pepper?
Six months make half a year.
translate: Şase luni însumează o jumătate de an.

text: I want to make a call.

translate: Am nevoie de o cameră foto.

text: I want to send an email.
Is there a sheet of paper and a pen here?
translate: Aveţi aici o foaie de hârtie şi un pix?
Nu îmi găsesc biletul de călătorie.

text: Do you know where his key is?
Do you know where his ticket is?
translate: Ştii unde este biletul lui de călătorie?

text: And her credit card is also gone.
translate: Şi cartea ei de credit a dispărut deasemenea.

text: Would you like to go for a walk?
I want to relax a little.
I want to ask you something.
I want to ask you for something.
I want to treat you to something.
translate: Doresc să vă invit la ceva.

text: Or do you prefer a tea?
translate: Sau doriţi mai bine un ceai?

text: They want to make a call.
translate: Ei vor să dea un telefon.

text: Are you already allowed to drive?
Are you already allowed to drink alcohol?
translate: Ai voie să bei deja alcool?

text: Are you already allowed to travel abroad alone?
translate: Ai voie să călătoreşti deja singur în străinătate?

text: May one pay by credit card?
translate: Se poate plăti cu carte de credit?

text: May one pay by cheque / check (am.)?
May one only pay in cash?
May I just make a call?
translate: Am voie să dau şi eu un telefon?
Am voie să întreb şi eu ceva?
Am voie să spun şi eu ceva?

text: He is not allowed to sleep in the park.
translate: Nu are voie să doarmă în parc.

text: He is not allowed to sleep in the car.
translate: Nu are voie să doarmă în maşină.

text: He is not allowed to sleep at the train station.
translate: Nu are voie să doarmă în gară.

text: 70 years ago he was still young.
translate: În urmă cu 70 de ani era încă tânăr.

text: A woman who weighs a hundred kilos is fat.
translate: O femeie la 100 de kilograme este grasă.

text: A man who weighs fifty kilos is thin.
translate: Un bărbat la 50 de kilograme este slab.

text: Where has he left his glasses?
The clock hangs on the wall.
The children cannot find their parents.
translate: Copiii nu îşi pot găsi părinţii.

text: How was your trip, Mr. Miller?
translate: Cum a fost excursia dumneavoastră domnule Müller?

text: Where is your wife, Mr. Miller?
translate: Unde este soţia dumneavoastră domnule Müller?

text: How was your trip, Mrs. Smith?
translate: Cum a fost excursia dumneavoastră doamnă Schmidt?

text: Where is your husband, Mrs. Smith?
translate: Unde este soţul dumneavoastră doamnă Schmidt?

translate: Trebuie să facă curat în locuinţă.

chapter: to have to do something / must
to have to do something / must
text: We must go to school at once.
translate: Trebuie să mergem imediat la şcoală.

chapter: to have to do something / must
text: We must go to work at once.
translate: Trebuie să mergem imediat la serviciu.

chapter: to have to do something / must
text: We must go to the doctor at once.
translate: Trebuie să mergem imediat la medic.

chapter: to have to do something / must
text: You must wait for the bus.

chapter: to have to do something / must
text: You must wait for the train.

chapter: to have to do something / must
text: You must wait for the taxi.
What do you want to do?
Do you want to play football / soccer (am.)?
Do you want to visit friends?
I don’t want to arrive late.
I don’t want to go there.
I want to stay at home.
Do you want to stay here?
Do you want to eat here?
Do you want to sleep here?
Do you want to leave tomorrow?
Do you want to stay till tomorrow?
Do you want to pay the bill only tomorrow?
translate: Vreţi să plătiţi factura abia mâine?

text: Do you want to go to the disco?
Do you want to go to the cinema?
Do you want to go to a café?
I didn’t come because I was ill.
translate: Nu am venit pentru că am fost bolnav.

text: She didn’t come because she was tired.
translate: Ea nu a venit pentru că era obosită.

text: He didn’t come because he wasn’t interested.
translate: El nu a venit pentru că nu avea chef.

text: We didn’t come because our car is damaged.
translate: Nu am venit pentru că maşina noastră este stricată.
De ce nu au venit oamenii?

text: They didn’t come because they missed the train.
translate: Nu au venit pentru că au pierdut trenul.

text: I didn’t come because I was not allowed to.
translate: Nu am venit pentru că nu am avut voie.

text: The pictures are on the CD.
The pictures are in the camera.
Can you clean the pants / trousers?

translate: Îmi daţi vă rog un foc?

text: Do you have a match or a lighter?
Did you have to call an ambulance?
translate: A trebuit să chemi o salvare?

text: Did you have to call the doctor?
Did you have to call the police?
Do you have the telephone number? I had it just now.
translate: Aveţi numărul de telefon? Mai înainte îl aveam încă.

text: Do you have the address? I had it just now.
translate: Aveţi adresa? Mai înainte o aveam încă.

text: Do you have the city map? I had it just now.
translate: Aveţi harta oraşului? Mai înainte o aveam încă.

text: Did he come on time? He could not come on time.
translate: A veni la timp? El nu a putut veni la timp.

text: Did he find the way? He could not find the way.
translate: A găsit drumul? El nu a putut găsi drumul.

text: Did he understand you? He could not understand me.
translate: Te-a înţeles? El nu m-a putut înţelege.

text: Why could you not come on time?
translate: De ce nu ai putut veni la timp?

text: Why could you not find the way?
translate: De ce nu ai putut găsi drumul?

text: Why could you not understand him?
translate: De ce nu l-ai putut înţelege?

text: I could not come on time because there were no buses.
translate: Nu am putut veni la timp deoarece nu a circulat nici un autobuz.

text: I could not find the way because I had no city map.
translate: Nu am putut găsi drumul deoarece nu am avut o hartă a oraşului.

text: I could not understand him because the music was so loud.
translate: Nu l-am putut înţelege deoarece muzica era aşa de tare.

text: I had to take a taxi.
translate: A trebuit să iau un taxi.

text: I had to buy a city map.
translate: A trebuit să cumpăr o hartă a oraşului.

text: I had to switch off the radio.
He is staying in a hotel.
He is staying in a cheap hotel.
He is reading a boring novel.
She is watching an exciting movie.
She took a piece of chocolate.
translate: Ea a luat o bucată de ciocolată.

text: He was disloyal, but she was loyal.
translate: El era infidel, dar ea era fidelă.

text: He was lazy, but she was hard-working.
translate: El era leneş, dar ea era harnică.

text: He was poor, but she was rich.
translate: El era sărac, dar ea era bogată.

text: He had no money, only debts.
translate: El nu a avut bani, ci datorii.

text: He had no luck, only bad luck.
translate: El nu a avut noroc, ci ghinion.

text: He had no success, only failure.
translate: El nu a avut succes, ci insucces.

text: He was not satisfied, but dissatisfied.
translate: El nu a fost mulţumit, ci nemulţumit.

text: He was not happy, but sad.
translate: El nu a fost fericit, ci nefericit.

text: He was not friendly, but unfriendly.
translate: El nu a fost simpatic, ci antipatic.

text: I was talking on the phone all the time.
translate: Am vorbit tot timpul la telefon.

text: I am not coming because the weather is so bad.
translate: Nu vin pentru că este vremea aşa de rea.

text: He isn’t coming because he isn’t invited.
translate: El nu vine pentru că nu este invitat.

text: I am not coming because I have no time.
translate: Nu vin pentru că nu am timp.

text: I am not staying because I still have to work.
translate: Nu rămân pentru că mai trebuie să lucrez.

text: I’m going because it is already late.
translate: Plec pentru că deja este târziu.

text: Why aren’t you eating the cake?
I’m not eating it because I must lose weight.
translate: Nu îl mănânc pentru că trebuie să slăbesc.

text: Why aren’t you drinking the beer?
I’m not drinking it because I have to drive.
translate: Nu o beau pentru că mai trebuie să conduc.

text: Why aren’t you drinking the coffee?
I’m not drinking it because it is cold.
translate: Nu o beau pentru că este rece.

text: Why aren’t you drinking the tea?
I’m not drinking it because I don’t have any sugar.
translate: Nu îl beau pentru că nu am zahăr.

text: Why aren’t you eating the soup?
I’m not eating it because I didn’t order it.
translate: Nu o mănânc pentru că nu am comandat-o.

text: Why don’t you eat the meat?
I’m not eating it because I am a vegetarian.
translate: Nu o mănânc pentru că sunt vegetarian.

text: I am wearing a blue dress.
I am wearing a red dress.
I am wearing a green dress.
An old lady lives at the top.
translate: Acolo sus locuieşte o femeie bătrână.

text: A fat lady lives at the top.
translate: Acolo sus locuieşte o femeie grasă.
Acolo jos locuieşte o femeie curioasă.
Musafirii noştri au fost persoane drăguţe.
Musafirii noştri au fost persoane politicoase.

text: You are so lazy – don’t be so lazy!
translate: Eşti atât de leneş – nu mai fi atât de leneş!

text: You sleep for so long – don’t sleep so late!
translate: Dormi aşa de mult – nu mai dormi aşa de mult!

text: You come home so late – don’t come home so late!
translate: Vii prea târziu – nu mai veni aşa de târziu!

text: You laugh so loudly – don’t laugh so loudly!
translate: Râzi prea tare – nu mai râde aşa de tare!

text: You speak so softly – don’t speak so softly!
translate: Vorbeşti aşa de încet – nu mai vorbi aşa de încet!
Musafirii noştri au fost persoane interesante.

text: But the neighbours have naughty children.
You drink too much – don’t drink so much!
translate: Bei prea mult – nu mai bea aşa de mult!

text: You smoke too much – don’t smoke so much!
translate: Fumezi prea mult – nu mai fuma aşa de mult!

text: You work too much – don’t work so much!
translate: Munceşti prea mult – nu mai munci aşa de mult!

text: You drive too fast – don’t drive so fast!
translate: Conduci aşa de repede – nu mai condu aşa de repede!

text: I know that – I knew that.
I write that – I wrote that.
I hear that – I heard that.
I’ll get it – I got it.
I’ll bring that – I brought that.
I’ll buy that – I bought that.
I expect that – I expected that.
I’ll explain that – I explained that.
I know that – I knew that.
I’m angry that you drink so much beer.
translate: Mă supără că bei aşa de multă bere.

text: I’m angry that you come so late.
translate: Mă supără că vii aşa târziu.

text: I think he needs a doctor.
translate: Cred că are nevoie de un medic.

text: I think he is sleeping now.
We hope that he marries our daughter.
translate: Sperăm să se căsătorească cu fiica noastră.

text: We hope that he has a lot of money.
We hope that he is a millionaire.
I heard that your wife had an accident.
translate: Am auzit că soţia ta a avut un accident.

text: I heard that she is in the hospital.
translate: Am auzit că este internată în spital.

text: I heard that your car is completely wrecked.
translate: Am auzit că maşina ta este complet distrusă.

text: I’m happy that you are interested.
I’m happy that you want to buy the house.
translate: Mă bucur că vreţi să cumpăraţi casa.

text: I’m afraid the last bus has already gone.
translate: Mă tem că ultimul autobuz a plecat deja.

text: I’m afraid we will have to take a taxi.
translate: Mă tem că va trebui să luăm un taxi.

text: I’m afraid I have no more money.
translate: Mă tem că nu am bani la mine.

text: My son did not want to play with the doll.
translate: Fiul meu nu a vrut să se joace cu păpuşa.

text: My daughter did not want to play football / soccer (am.).
translate: Fiica mea nu a vrut să joace fotbal cu mine.

text: My wife did not want to play chess with me.
translate: Soţia mea nu a vrut să joace şah cu mine.

text: My children did not want to go for a walk.
translate: Copiii mei nu au vrut să se plimbe.

text: They did not want to tidy the room.
translate: Nu au vrut să strângă în cameră.

text: They did not want to go to bed.
translate: Nu au vrut să meargă în pat.

text: He was not allowed to eat ice cream.
translate: Nu a avut voie să mănânce îngheţată.

text: He was not allowed to eat chocolate.
translate: Nu a avut voie să mănânce ciocolată.

text: He was not allowed to eat sweets.
translate: Nu a avut voie să mănânce bomboane.

text: I was allowed to make a wish.
translate: Am avut voie să-mi doresc ceva.

text: I was allowed to buy myself a dress.
translate: Am avut voie să-mi cumpăr o rochie.

text: I was allowed to take a chocolate.
translate: Am avut voie să-mi iau o pralină.

text: Were you allowed to smoke in the airplane?
translate: Ai avut voie să fumezi în avion?

text: Were you allowed to drink beer in the hospital?
translate: Ai avut voie să bei bere în spital?

text: Were you allowed to take the dog into the hotel?
translate: Ai avut voie să iei câinele cu tine în hotel?

text: During the holidays the children were allowed to remain outside late.
translate: În vacanţe copiii aveau voie să stea mult afară.

text: They were allowed to play in the yard for a long time.
translate: Aveau voie să se joace mult în curte.

text: They were allowed to stay up late.
translate: Aveau voie să stea treji până târziu.

text: I’ll wait until my hair is dry.
translate: Aştept până mi s-a uscat părul.

text: I’ll wait until the film is over.
I’ll wait until the traffic light is green.
translate: Aştept până se face verde la semafor.

text: When do you go on holiday?

translate: Încă înainte de vacanţa de vară?

text: Yes, before the summer holidays begin.
translate: Da, încă înainte să înceapă vacanţa de vară.

text: Repair the roof before the winter begins.
translate: Repară acoperişul înainte să vină iarna.

text: Wash your hands before you sit at the table.
translate: Spală-te pe mâini înainte să te aşezi la masă.

text: Close the window before you go out.
Yes, after the class is over.
translate: Da, după ce se termină cursul.

text: After he had an accident, he could not work anymore.
translate: După ce a avut un accident nu a mai putut lucra.

text: Since when is she no longer working?
Yes, she is no longer working since she got married.
translate: Da, nu mai lucrează de când s-a căsătorit.

text: Since she got married, she’s no longer working.
translate: De când s-a căsătorit, nu mai lucrează.

text: Since they have met each other, they are happy.
translate: De când se cunosc, sunt fericiţi.

text: After he had lost his job, he went to America.
translate: După ce şi-a pierdut slujba a plecat în America.

text: After he went to America, he became rich.
translate: După ce a plecat în America s-a îmbogăţit.

text: Since they have had children, they rarely go out.
translate: De când au copii, ies rar în oraş.
Vorbeşte la telefon în timp ce conduce.

text: She watches TV while she irons.
translate: Se uită la televizor în timp ce calcă.

text: She listens to music while she does her work.
translate: Ascultă muzică în timp ce-şi face lecţiile.

text: I can’t see anything when I don’t have glasses.
translate: Nu văd nimic dacă nu am ochelari.

text: I can’t understand anything when the music is so loud.
translate: Nu înţeleg nimic dacă muzica este aşa tare.

text: I can’t smell anything when I have a cold.
translate: Nu miros nimic dacă sunt răcit.

text: We’ll take a taxi if it rains.
We’ll travel around the world if we win the lottery.
translate: Călătorim în jurul lumii dacă câştigăm la loto.

text: We’ll start eating if he doesn’t come soon.
translate: Începem să mâncăm dacă nu vine în curând.

text: How did you pass the exam?
How did you find the way?
With whom did you make an appointment?
With whom did you celebrate your birthday?
translate: Cu cine aţi sărbătorit ziua de naștere?

text: What did you come to know?
We had to water the flowers.
We had to clean the apartment.
translate: A trebuit să strângem în apartament.

text: We had to wash the dishes.
Did you have to pay the bill?
Did you have to pay an entrance fee?
Did you have to pay a fine?
translate: A trebuit să plătiţi o amendă?
Cine a trebuit să îşi ia rămas bun?

text: Who had to go home early?
translate: Cine a trebuit să meargă devreme acasă?

text: Who had to take the train?
translate: Cine a trebuit să ia trenul?

text: We did not want to stay long.
translate: Nu am vrut să stăm mult.

text: We did not want to drink anything.
translate: Nu am vrut să bem nimic.

text: We did not want to disturb you.
I just wanted to make a call.
translate: Tocmai am vrut să dau un telefon.

text: I just wanted to call a taxi.
translate: Am vrut să comand un taxi.

text: Actually I wanted to drive home.
translate: Am vrut să mă duc acasă.

text: I thought you wanted to call your wife.
translate: Am crezut că vroiai să-ţi suni soţia.

text: I thought you wanted to call information.
translate: Am crezut că vroiai să suni la informaţii.

text: I thought you wanted to order a pizza.
translate: Am crezut că vroiai să comanzi o pizza.

text: Which newspaper did you subscribe to?
Why did you become a teacher?
Why did you take a taxi?
translate: De ce aţi luat un taxi?

text: I get up as soon as the alarm rings.
translate: Mă trezesc imediat ce sună ceasul deşteptător.

text: I become tired as soon as I have to study.
translate: Obosesc imediat ce trebuie să învăţ.

text: I will stop working as soon as I am 60.
translate: Încetez să mai lucrez imediat ce am împlinit 60 de ani.

text: As soon as I have a moment.
translate: Imediat ce am un moment de timp.

text: He’ll call, as soon as he has a little time.
translate: El sună imediat ce are puţin timp.

text: I’ll work as long as I can.
translate: Voi lucra atâta timp cât pot.

text: I’ll work as long as I am healthy.
translate: Voi lucra atâta timp cât sunt sănătos.

text: He lies in bed instead of working.
translate: El stă în pat în loc să lucreze.

text: She reads the newspaper instead of cooking.
translate: Ea citeşte ziarul în loc să gătească.

text: He is at the bar instead of going home.
translate: Stă în cârciumă, în loc să meargă acasă.

text: As far as I know, he lives here.
As far as I know, his wife is ill.
translate: Din câte ştiu, soţia lui este bolnavă.

text: As far as I know, he is unemployed.
I overslept; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: Nu m-am trezit la timp, altfel aş fi fost punctual.

text: I missed the bus; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: Am pierdut autobuzul, altfel aş fi fost punctual.

text: I didn’t find the way / I got lost; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: Nu am găsit drumul, altfel aş fi fost punctual.

text: Perhaps the weather will get better tomorrow.
translate: Vremea va fi probabil mâine mai bună.

text: I hope that it gets better.
translate: Sper că va fi mai bine.

text: Do you know that for sure?
I think that it is old.

translate: Cred că arată chiar foarte bine.

text: The boss definitely has a girlfriend.
It is very possible that he has a girlfriend.
translate: Este foarte posibil să aibă o prietenă.

text: Have you already been to Berlin?
translate: Aţi fost deja odată la Berlin?

text: No, I don’t know anyone here.
translate: Nu, nu cunosc pe nimeni / nimenea aici.

text: a little longer – not much longer
Will you stay here a little longer?
No, I won’t stay here much longer.
translate: Nu, nu mai rămân mult timp aici.

text: Would you like to drink something else?
No, I don’t want anything else.
No, I haven’t eaten anything yet.
Does anyone else want a coffee?
He fell asleep although the TV was on.
translate: El a adormit, deşi televizorul era pornit.

text: He stayed a while although it was late.
translate: El a mai rămas, deşi era deja târziu.

text: He didn’t come although we had made an appointment.
translate: El nu a venit, deşi ne-am dat întâlnire.

text: The TV was on. Nevertheless, he fell asleep.
translate: Televizorul era pornit. Totuşi el a adormit.

text: It was already late. Nevertheless, he stayed a while.
translate: Era deja târziu. Totuşi el a mai rămas.

text: We had made an appointment. Nevertheless, he didn’t come.
translate: Ne-am dat întâlnire. Totuşi el nu a venit.

text: Although he has no license, he drives the car.
translate: Cu toate că nu are permis, conduce maşina.

text: Although the road is slippery, he drives so fast.
translate: Cu toate că strada este alunecoasă, el conduce repede.

text: Although he is drunk, he rides his bicycle.
translate: Cu toate că este beat, merge cu bicicleta.

text: Despite having no licence / license (am.), he drives the car.
translate: El nu are permis de conducere. Totuşi conduce maşina.

text: Despite the road being slippery, he drives fast.
translate: Strada este alunecoasă. Totuşi conduce aşa repede.

text: Despite being drunk, he rides the bike.
translate: El este beat. Totuşi merge cu bicicleta.

text: Although she went to college, she can’t find a job.
translate: Deşi a studiat, nu găseşte un post.

text: The journey was beautiful, but too tiring.
translate: Călătoria a fost frumoasă, dar prea obositoare.

text: The train was on time, but too full.
translate: Trenul a fost punctual, dar prea aglomerat.

text: The hotel was comfortable, but too expensive.
translate: Hotelul a fost confortabil, dar prea scump.

text: He’ll take either the bus or the train.
Although she is in pain, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: Deşi are dureri, ea nu merge la medic.

text: Although she has no money, she buys a car.
translate: Deşi nu are bani, ea cumpără o maşină.

text: She went to college. Nevertheless, she can’t find a job.
translate: Ea a studiat. Totuşi nu găseşte un post.

text: She is in pain. Nevertheless, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: Ea are dureri. Totuşi nu merge la medic.

text: She has no money. Nevertheless, she buys a car.
translate: Ea nu are bani. Totuşi cumpără o maşină.

text: He’ll come either this evening or tomorrow morning.
translate: Vine ori în seara asta ori mâine dimineaţă.

text: He’s going to stay either with us or in the hotel.
translate: Locuieşte sau la noi sau la hotel.

text: She speaks Spanish as well as English.
translate: Vorbeşte atât spaniolă cât şi engleză.

text: She has lived in Madrid as well as in London.
translate: A trăit atât în Madrid cât şi în Londra.

text: She knows Spain as well as England.
translate: Cunoaşte atât Spania cât şi Anglia.

text: He is not only stupid, but also lazy.
translate: Nu este numai prost, ci şi leneş.

text: She is not only pretty, but also intelligent.
translate: Nu este numai drăguţă, ci şi inteligentă.

text: She speaks not only German, but also French.
translate: Nu vorbeşte numai germană, ci şi franceză.

text: I can neither play the piano nor the guitar.
translate: Nu pot să cânt nici la pian nici la chitară.

text: I can neither waltz nor do the samba.
translate: Nu pot dansa nici vals nici samba.

text: I like neither opera nor ballet.
translate: Nu îmi place nici operă nici balet.

text: The faster you work, the earlier you will be finished.
translate: Cu cât lucrezi mai repede, cu atâta termini mai repede.

text: The earlier you come, the earlier you can go.
translate: Cu cât vii mai repede, cu atâta poţi să pleci mai repede.

text: The older one gets, the more complacent one gets.
translate: Cu cât devii mai în vârstă, cu atât devii mai comod.

text: The button from the shirt is gone.
translate: Nasturele de la cămaşă s-a descusut.
Cheia de la garaj a dispărut.

text: The boss’ computer is not working.
How do I get to her parents’ house?
translate: Cum ajung la casa părinţilor ei?

text: The house is at the end of the road.
translate: Casa este amplasată la capătul străzii.

text: What is the name of the capital city of Switzerland?
What is the title of the book?
What are the names of the neighbour’s / neighbor’s (am.) children?

translate: Când sunt vacanţele şcolare ale copiilor?

text: What are the doctor’s consultation times?
translate: Când sunt orele de vizită ale doctorului?

text: What time is the museum open?
translate: Care sunt orele de deschidere ale muzeului?

text: I don’t know if he loves me.
I don’t know if he’ll come back.
I don’t know if he’ll call me.
I wonder if he thinks about me.
translate: Mă întreb dacă se gândeşte la mine.

text: I wonder if he has someone else.
translate: Mă întreb dacă are pe altcineva.

text: Maybe he tells me the truth?
I doubt whether he really likes me.
translate: Mă îndoiesc că mă place cu adevărat.

text: I doubt whether he’ll write to me.
I doubt whether he’ll marry me.
translate: Mă îndoiesc că se însoară cu mine.
